title: A front-runner emerges in the European small launcher race
summary: Isar Aerospace could launch its Spectrum rocket within the next year.

title: Isar Aerospace raises $165 million as it gears up for first launch
summary: German launch vehicle developer Isar Aerospace announced March 28 it raised $165 million to scale up production of its Spectrum rocket scheduled to make its first flight later this year.

title: U.S. allies in the Middle East express interest in establishing space forces
summary: Several military allies of the United States in the Middle East have expressed interest in creating their own space forces, and have sought advice from the U.S. on how to accomplish this goal.

title: Virgin Orbit Extends Shutdown, Lifeline Investment Talks Collapse
summary: According to a company-wide email from CEO Dan Hart, Virgin Orbit will be extending its operational pause again to pursue an investment that could save the company.

title: Virgin Orbit extends unpaid pause as Brown deal collapses, ‘dynamic’ talks continue
summary: Virgin Orbit is again extending its unpaid pause in operations to continue pursuing a lifeline investment, CEO Dan Hart told employees in a company-wide email.
